title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.45 - Appeal of determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.45 - Appeal of determination

State Regulations
(a) A final
determination of the grandfathered quantity by the executive director must be
appealed to the commission within 30 days from actual notice of the
determination. (b) The commission
shall appoint a hearing officer to preside over appeals under this section. Hearings shall be governed by the procedures set forth in Part 1808 of this

Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1806.45

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
